bwwExcerpt: Overall, this is an enjoyably splashy, starry start to Tim Sheader’s reign at the Donmar. But the fact you never really know what’s going to happen is not always a positive. Brody is magnetic and engaging, but much of what unfolds seems daft or fantastical.
wrongProductionNote: Show in previews (opens 2026-04-15) - review predates Broadway production
